channel.title: New game -- better then gta, mw2 ect
channel.description:
GTA SOMALIA [img]http://www.nassej.org/GTA_Somalia_sm.jpg[/img]
Information:
[ul][li]Release Date: 29 September 2010[/li] [li]$60 (Pre-Order)[/li] [li]1/3 Money raised goes towards helping Somaliland[/li] [li]Comes with Trolley cars, customised bin houses, gang cribs in the form of bushes ect.[/li] [li]3D | Graphics as good as real life[/li] [li]New Jobs to pick from! (Pirating, Hooking Bins, Selling Mud ect.)[/li][/ul]
Footage: [img]http://www.threadbombing.com/data/media/41/kid_with_gun.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.dailycomedy.com/images/jokes/b/2438_0_somali_pirates_pic.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.topnews.in/files/Somalia-pirates.jpg[/img] [img]http://media.thestar.topscms.com/images/9a/bd/657ec9334a288a9d36164243377b.jpeg[/img]
At the end of the release speak they said the upcoming GTA will be: [img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/uncyclopedia/images/thumb/e/e3/GTA_-_Borat_vs_Bush_-_jpegged.JPG/250px-GTA_-_Borat_vs_Bush_-_jpegged.JPG[/img]
